summary: Completed comprehensive testing of toast confirmation system across all app features. All toast notifications are working correctly with proper messaging, positioning, and user interaction.
passed_tests: Toast appears after saving daily check-in with message 'Check-in saved'
Toast appears after adding weight with message 'Weight added'
Toast appears after adding body fat with message 'Body fat added'
Toast appears after adding mortgage payment with message 'Payment added'
Toast appears after adding mortgage balance check with message 'Balance check added'
Toast appears after saving vacation plan with message 'Vacation plan saved'
Toast appears after adding gift with message 'Gift added'
Toast appears after saving settings with message 'Settings saved'
Toast auto-hides after 2.5 seconds as expected
Toast positioning is correct (bottom-right, fixed position)
Toast styling and visual design is appropriate
All form submissions trigger appropriate toast confirmations
